page.title: 01VALERIE ROBINSON
page.content: The international hockey player Valerie Robinson was named as an officer of the order of the British Empire in l985. She was given an O.B.E. because of her great effort and dedication she puts into her sport. Valerie was the first working class girl to be capped by her country. Since l963 Valerie Robinson who lives in the Foxhill Bank Recreation Centre, Oswaldtwistle with her husband Gwyn has been capped by England over one hundred times. She started to play when she was fourteen years old for Accrington High School team. She later became a P.E. teacher and then in l980 opened a residential hockey centre at Foxhill Bank. Students come from all across Gt. Britain to gain first class hockey
